Topic.Title: How To Guides Are Missing Pictures

Posts.EditableText:
Hello,

I'm trying to learn how to use a bunch of different things via the How To Guides. All the pictures are missing, which makes it very difficult to learn this stuff. There are broken image icons where all the pictures should be. I'm using Google Chrome if that makes a difference? Please help...
PS - All the pictures in the Tutorial are still there.
Posts.HTML:

Posts.EditableText:
Interesting.  I just checked it here, too, and the pic links are broken.  Strange!  I assume this is something Alex may have to answer?

Although I just tested again using Firefox browser and things were fine...(I normally use Chrome)?

EDIT:  went back and tested again on Chrome... guess what?  It worked just fine!  I guess you have to have a magic clicker-finger!
Posts.HTML:
Interesting. I just checked it here, too, and the pic links are broken. Strange! I assume this is something Alex may have to answer?

Although I just tested again using Firefox browser and things were fine...(I normally use Chrome)?

EDIT: went back and tested again on Chrome... guess what? It worked just fine! I guess you have to have a magic clicker-finger!

Posts.EditableText:
also...

quest previously used a separate website(s) for the forum and/or doc site, but now it has been switched to be integrated with the quest game website. So that's why a lot of the images were lost and/or just removed from those 3rd party pic sites that the user's used for their images/pics.
